# tf.compat.v1.flags.doc_to_help


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">
</table>



Takes a __doc__ string and reformats it as help.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.app.flags.doc_to_help`


``` python
tf.compat.v1.flags.doc_to_help(doc)
```
